eightQueens

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • eightQueens.ChessBoard

  • public class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    ChessBoard class that creates a chess board and has methods to solve the n queens problem ChessBoard comes equipped with both recursive and non-recursive methods for your solution-finding convenience
    Author:
    Braden Hoagland

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DELAY
      delay between moves that are shown in the recursive solution-finding process
      javax.swing.JPanel grid

      size of the board and number of queens

      arrayList of the current queens on the board
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Queen>> recursiveSolutions
      all solutions found to the N queens problem; to be filled by the findAll(qs) recursive method

      screen size constant

      constant that determines what the size of the gui should be

      array of all spaces (ChessSquarePanels) on the board

        public void updateQueens(java.util.ArrayList<Queen> qs)
        update the display of queens on the board
        Parameters:
        qs - list of queens to display

      • isCorrect

        public boolean isCorrect(java.util.ArrayList<Queen> list)
        determine if a given set of queens is a solution to the n queens problem
        Parameters:
        list - list of queens on the board
        Returns:
        true if the queens form a solution, false otherwise

      • isSafe

        public boolean isSafe(Queen q,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Queen> qs)
        determines if a given queen is not threatened by any of the given queens
        Parameters:
        q - queen to check
        qs - all queens on the board
        Returns:
        true if the queen is safe, false if it is threatened by another queen

      • moveToSafeSpot

        public boolean moveToSafeSpot(Queen q,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Queen> qs)
        moves the given queen down until it finds a safe space; if no safe space can be found, the queen is left in the last row and the method returns false
        Parameters:
        q - queen to be moved
        qs - all queens on the current board
        Returns:
        true if a safe space is found; false otherwise

      • showMove

        public void showMove(java.util.ArrayList<Queen> qs)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        update the queens on the board and display them, pausing for a set amount of time; if the board displays a solution to the n queens problem, pause longer and make the black spaces flash green
        Parameters:
        qs - all queens on the current board
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • changeColoredPanels

        public void changeColoredPanels(java.awt.Color c)
        change all colored panels on the board to the given color
        Parameters:
        c - color to set the colored panels to

      • notifyCorrect

        public void notifyCorrect()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        makes the colored panels flash green for a longer amount of time than the move delay time
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • findOne

        public java.util.ArrayList<Queen> findOne()
        finds one solution to the n queens problem non-recursively
        Returns:
        arrayList of Queens that stores a solution to the n queens problem

      • findAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Queen>> findAll()
        finds all solutions to the n queens problem non-recursively
        Returns:
        arrayList of arrayLsit of Queens that stores all solutions to the n queens problem

      • findOne

        public java.util.ArrayList<Queen> findOne(java.util.ArrayList<Queen> qs)
                                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        finds one solution to the n queens problem recursively
        Parameters:
        qs - arrayList of queens that stores all queens that have already been added to the board during the method; when calling this method, pass an empty arrayList into it
        Returns:
        arrayList of queens that stores a solution to the n queens problem
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • findAll

        public void findAll(java.util.ArrayList<Queen> qs,
                    boolean showMoves)
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        finds all solutions to the n queens problem recursively
        Parameters:
        qs - arrayList of queens that stores all queens that have already been added to the board during the method; when calling this method, pass an empty arrayList into it
        showMoves - true if you want to display each move with a slight delay; false if you want to just calculate all solutions without displaying the recursive process
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
